WARP_SURGE_DESC_curseOfTheBloom: Your Knights suffer [r:-1] Max HP for the remainder of the mission.
WARP_SURGE_DESC_grandfathersCurse: Your Knights suffer [r:-1] Max WP for the remainder of the mission.
WARP_SURGE_DESC_denizensOfTheWarp: A Warp Rift has opened:  Enemy Reinforcements will arrive next turn.
WARP_SURGE_DESC_missionObjectiveReinforc: Unexpected enemy reinforcements have arrived from the Warp!  [b:(Does not draw from your reinforcements pool)]
WARP_SURGE_DESC_poxGift: Poxwalkers will rise from corpses next turn!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_lesserPoxGift: Lesser Poxwalkers rise from nearby corpses immediately!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_plagueGift: Plaguebearers will rise from corpses next turn!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_lesserMutation: Some of our Enemies gain Mutations!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_greaterMutation: Many of our Enemies gain Mutations!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_nurglesRevoltingRegenera: All Enemies Heal 50% of their Max HP!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_theGrandfathersBlessing: All Enemies gain +5 Armour for 1 Turn!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_thePowerOfMutation: All strain-specific Mutations on Enemies are doubled in power!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_bloomspawnPrison: One of your Knights is trapped by a Bloomspawn Growth.  Cleanse it to free them.
WARP_SURGE_DESC_kissOfFraility: A Zone of Weakness appears for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_theFalteringPox: One of your Knights suffers the Hobbled Affliction for 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_nurglesEmbrace: Plague Zones appear for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_innexorableBlight: All of your Knights have their Resistance set to [g:0%] for 5 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_taintedBlades: All Enemy [b:Melee Attacks] Afflict [b:Immobilized] ([g:100%], [g:1 Turn]) for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_theRelentlessHost: All Enemies cannot be Stunned for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_weaponVirus: Zones that disables [b:Ranged Weapons] appear for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_bladesOfRust: All Enemy [b:Melee Attacks] gain Armour Pierce for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_theUnbreakingHost: All Enemies gain -50% CRIT Vulnerability for the next 5 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_punishTheWitch: Your Knights suffer 1 DMG when using Psychic Abilities for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_psychicFeedback: Your Knights Psychic Abilities cost +1 WP for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_empyreanSurge: Your Stratagems cannot be activated for the next 5 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_drainingBlades: All Enemy [b:Melee Attacks] Afflict [b:Drained] for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_withoutRelief: Your Knights Heal abilities reduce to [g:0] for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_fieldsOfAgony: Deadly Hazard Zones appear for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_searingBlades: All Enemy [b:Melee Attacks] deal -1 Max HP for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_putridDetonation: Enemies explode on death, dealing 3 DMG in an Area for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_lesserBloomspawnEruption: New Bloomspawn have emerged in the battle!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_theBloomProtects: All Bloomspawn gain +5 Armour for the next 3 Turns!
WARP_SURGE_DESC_greaterBloomspawnEruptio: Many new Bloomspawn have everged in the battle!
COMBAT_EVENT_DESC_bloomRootReinforcement: Brings forth a [b:Chaos Spawn]. Mortarion is protected by the [b:Root of Poxus].
Brings forth a [b:Foetid Bloat Drone]. Mortarion is protected by the [b:Root of Necrosus].
Brings forth a [b:Plague Ridden]. Mortarion is protected by the [b:Root of Mortus].
Brings forth a [b:Helbrute]. Mortarion is protected by the [b:Root of Dolorus].
Brings forth a [b:Myphitic Blight Hauler]. Mortarion is protected by the [b:Root of Tentarus].
COMBAT_EVENT_DESC_powerOfTheBloomPoxus: Mortarion attunes to the Root of Poxus
COMBAT_EVENT_DESC_powerOfTheBloomNecrosu: Mortarion attunes to the Root of Necrosus
COMBAT_EVENT_DESC_powerOfTheBloomMortus: Mortarion attunes to the Root of Mortus
COMBAT_EVENT_DESC_powerOfTheBloomDolorus: Mortarion attunes to the Root of Dolorus
COMBAT_EVENT_DESC_powerOfTheBloomTentaru: Mortarion attunes to the Root of Tentarus
BLOOM_STRAIN_POXUS_OBJECTIVE: Kaldor Draigo Must Destroy the Poxus Root
BLOOM_STRAIN_MORTUS_OBJECTIVE: Kaldor Draigo Must Destroy the Mortus Root
BLOOM_STRAIN_NECROSUS_OBJECTIVE: Kaldor Draigo Must Destroy the Necrosus Root
BLOOM_STRAIN_TENTARUS_OBJECTIVE: Kaldor Draigo Must Destroy the Tentarus Root
BLOOM_STRAIN_DOLORUS_OBJECTIVE: Kaldor Draigo Must Destroy the Dolorus Root
COMBAT_EVENT_OBJECTIVE_DefeatRearguard: Prevent as many Enemies from entering as possible.
WARP_SURGE_DESC_guardiansOfTheSeeds: A Warp Rift has opened. Enemies will arrive to seek retribution next turn.
WARP_SURGE_DESC_defendTheBloomspawn: A Warp Rift has opened. Enemies will arrive to defend the Bloomspawn next turn.
WARP_SURGE_DESC_wailsOfChaos: The Chaos Gate cries out for aid! Enemy forces gain [g:+1] Reinforcements.
WARP_SURGE_DESC_defendersOfTheGate_Rift: A Warp Rift has opened: the Chaos Gate's Defenders will arrive next turn.
STRATAGEM_PRECISION_TELEPORT_DESCRIPTION: All Knights [b:Teleport] to any visible location. All Knights [r:-1] AP.
STRATAGEM_SURGE_PREVENTION_2_DESCRIPTION: Reduce Warp Surge by [g:{warpSurgeDown}]% for [g:{effectDuration}] turns.
STRATAGEM_BLOOM_EXCISION_DESCRIPTION: Target a Blast over Area [g:{radius}] to {instantEffect}.  Afflicted targets lose all [b:Mutations].
STRATAGEM_PRECISION_BOMBARD_DESCRIPTION: Target a Blast over Area [g:{radius}] to deal [g:{damage}] DMG.  [b:Knockback].
STRATAGEM_RIGHTEOUS_ENDURANCE_DESCRIPTIO: All [b:Fallen Knights]: Recover immediately with [g:50%] [b:Max HP].
STRATAGEM_MASS_PURIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: All Knights [b:Purify] and {instantEffect}.  Affected Knights lose all their Afflictions.
